reuters.title: ST LOUIS DELIVERABLE CORN STOCKS
reuters.body: The CFTC reported the following stocks of corn in St Louis as of Friday, april 3 , deliverable against Chicago Board of Trade futures in 000's bushels - CURRENT WEEK YEAR WEEK AGO AGO DEL GRADES 640 225 369 NON-DEL GRADES/UNGRADED 0 0 25 CCC STOCKS 397 397 153 TOTAL CORN STOCKS 1037 622 547 Reuter 
